## DrawText.setFont() method

Set the font that will be used to draw strings

**Signature:**

```typescript
static setFont(device: AbstractDevice, name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  device | [AbstractDevice](doc/markdown/./device.abstractdevice.md) | The render device |
|  name | string | The font name |

**Returns:**

void
